channel.title: À propos. 👨🏻‍💻 on salinger
channel.description: Recent content in À propos. 👨🏻‍💻 on salinger

item.title: Front Matter
item.description: 🔥 read the update wiki on the github wiki section Global Config Besides to Hugo Global config there are some more variables that can be used in config.toml. Site Params # Optional Footer copyright = 'Name' [params] # True if the header must appears also in the homepage (default: True) showHeaderOnHomepage = true # Google Analytics G-Tag (optional) googleAnalytics = "G-XX00000" # True if you want to use Twemoji (optional) twemoji = false # Optional text for 404 text.

item.title: Front Matter
item.description: 🔥 trytry Global Config Beside to Hugo Global config there are some more variables that can be used in config.toml. Site Params # Optional Footer copyright = 'Name' [params] # True if the header must appears also in the homepage (default: True) showHeaderOnHomepage = true # Google Analytics G-Tag (optional) googleAnalytics = "G-XX00000" # True if you want to use Twemoji (optional) twemoji = false # Optional text for 404 text.
